sources.title: Gladiator of Rome
sources.description: http://www.imdb.com/title/tt0056026/ Spaghetti and sandal epic, dubbed in English. Gordon Scott, a warrior (no grapevines) protecting a slave girl, who is really a princess, winds up as a gladiator in the Roman arenas.

metadata.Plot: A warrior protecting a slave girl, who is really a princess, winds up as a gladiator in the Roman arenas.
metadata.Writer: Gian Paolo Callegari, Giuseppe Mariani, John Davis Hart
metadata.Actors: Gordon Scott, Wandisa Guida, Roberto Risso
